thread.title: Need to do better, all fixable by the right type of management
thread.title_full: Need to do better, all fixable by the right type of management - Review of Hyatt Union Square New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: M852TDbryanm
title: Need to do better, all fixable by the right type of management
text: Clearly poor management. Scattered staff, rude and more interested hanging out at the front and socializing. Linens and robe in room dirty. Front entrance closed and horrible path through alternative entrance
